thread.section_title: Kimpton Hotel Eventi - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Central Location
thread.title_full: Central Location - Review of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ellen B
title: Central Location
text:
The Eventi is a perfectly located hotel in Midtown. The room was very clean and well organized with good lighting and adequate storage space. There was an easily accessible safe. Elevators were very efficient. The wine hour which is a signature of Kimpton properties is not as welcoming and enjoyable as in other Kimpton -- very little seating; dark; on 3rd floor rather than in the lobby. Lobby also seemed dark and a bit hectic compared to other Kimptons. Bed was very comfortable and the view of the Empire State Building was spectacular. Front desk was efficient but did not seem to have a concierge and no city maps available.
Room Tip: Ask for view of Empire State Building See more room tips
